Title: The Marine Biologist
Plot: Jerry meets an old college classmate who asked about George, whom Jerry says is now a "marine biologist." An infuriated Russian writer tosses an electronic organizer belonging to Elaine out of a limousine that hits a passerby on the head. Kramer struggles with his golf swing and sand. While walking along the beach, George is called on to use his marine biology skills to save a whale.
GuestStars: David Blackwood, Wayne Knight, Larry David, Carol Kane, George Murdock, Rosalind Allen, Heather Morgan
